sentence.Network_en: "I told you Preskel had no idea," remarked Kemp with some asperity.
sentence.Network_cn: “我告诉过你普雷斯克毫不知情的，”肯普颇为不耐烦地说道。

sentence.Network_en: He spoke to the boy with asperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他严厉地对那男孩讲话.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs Tremaine, wrought up, could resist an unusual asperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 屈里曼太太被惹上气来, 忍不住尖锐地顶她一句.

list.abs: 花叶滇苦菜（学名：Sonchus asper）是菊科苦苣菜属的植物。分布于西亚、乌兹别克斯坦、喜马拉雅山、欧洲、日本、俄罗斯、哈萨 …
...卷盔鲨（学名Cirrhigaleus asper），又名卷角鲨，是角鲨科下的一种鲨鱼。它们分布在北纬35°至南纬35°水深200-600的海域。它们可以长达1.2米。卷盔鲨是重型的鲨鱼，其吻圆而钝，外皮上有小齿突起，身体没有斑点，第一背鳍的位置较胸鳍后。它们出没于上大陆.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'hardship, rigour'): from Old French asperite, or Latin asperitas, from asper 'rough'

entry.def: If you say something with asperity, you say it impatiently and severely.

example.ex: 'I told you Preskel had no idea,' remarked Kemp with some asperity.
example.tran: “我告诉过你普雷斯克毫不知情的，”肯普颇为不耐烦地说道。

auth_sentence.content: The nakedness and asperity of the wintry world.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The nakedness and asperity of the wintry world.

auth_sentence.content: In the asperity of early winter, he seemed grossly overfed.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the asperity of early winter, he seemed grossly overfed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the asperity of early winter, he seemed grossly overfed.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不顾一切的,铤而走险的;绝望的,危急的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+sper希望+ate……的→去掉希望的
pro很多+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
a不+sper希望+ity表名词→不给人希望→粗鲁,暴力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 暴徒,[尤指早期美国西部的]亡命之徒
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,无+sper希望+ado人→无希望之人
desperate[adj.不顾一切的,铤而走险的;绝望的,危急的]+ion表名词→n.铤而走险,拼命

stems_affixes.value_cn: 成功,兴隆,昌盛,使成功,使昌隆,繁荣
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro很多+sper希望→很多的希望→繁荣
